About the Company: Somi Conveyor Beltings Ltd is a widely acclaimed manufacturers, exporters and suppliers of conveyor belts of all grades for material handling in India.The product range of the company includes Conveyor Belt -General Purpose -Heat Resistance -Super HR -Fire Resistance -Somiflex Secial Belts-M-24 -ROCK-2007 -HR -SHR & UHR-FR -FR-79-SA-54 -SC-36 -SEHR-36 -SEFR-72.Pipe Conveyor Belt.Rubber conveyor belt.Rubber tyre valves.Tyre vulnanizer.Conveyor belt cleaner.Rubber tyre vulcanizer.Conveyor belt vulcanizer.Pulley lagging rubber sheets.
